ðŸ“– Summary: Persepolis Download Manager is a free and open-source download manager written in Python, supporting multi-segment downloads, scheduling, and queuing. It is available for GNU/Linux, BSDs, macOS, and Windows, and can download videos from platforms like YouTube.
